Provides working with Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) âœ¨

Example

regCORS:
  origins: ["https://google.com", "http://localhost:5000"]
  methods: ["GET", "POST"]
  headers: ["*"]
  credentials: true

  allowCredentials*: bool
  allowHeaders*: string
